common_validation.email: This field does not match email format
common_validation.phone: This field does not match phone format
common_validation.min_length: This field must contain at least {min} symbols
common_validation.numeric: This field can contain only numbers
common_validation.contain_lower_case: This field must contain at least one lower case symbol
common_validation.contain_upper_case: This field must contain at least one upper case symbol
common_validation.only_latin: This field must contain only latin letters
common_validation.contan_number: This field must contain at least one number
common_validation.special_symbol: This field must contain at least one special symbol
common_validation.password_match: This field must match the password

view_forgot_password.description_email: The email with the reset password link was sent to your email. In case if you did not received the email check if your email address is written correctly and then press the "Send again" button

confirmation.hint_email: The email with the confirmation link was sent to your email. In case if you did not received the email check if your email address is written correctly and then press the "Send again" button
confirmation.hint_sms: The SMS with the confirmation code was sent to your phone. In case if you did not received the SMS check if your phone number is written correctly and then press the "Send again" button

view_reset_password.success: Your password was resetted successfully. Now you can log in
